description: Variation of conditions 1 and 6 of planning permission dated 02 March 2017 (RN: 17/00127/FULL) for the: Internal and external alterations including works to the roof, the installation of new plant, the raising of and installation of new rooflights, creation of roof terrace and associated works. Namely, to allow alterations to beam in the valley between the skylights and addition of two new columns, removal of chimney to east and south elevations, extension of sliding doors onto the fourth-floor terrace to the full width, replacement of the west rooflight glazing, roof layout alterations, amendments to roof facade and rewording of condition 6.
